name: Helen Wesley
text: Pizza hut pizza is always the best, but it was the atmosphere and friendly staff that I really enjoyed. The salad bar was actually clean and well stocked which is a big thing for me. And the plain and simple fact that it was an actual ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Maronay
text: It's decent Pizza for a good price. We always stop here and feed the kids on our way back from Rocky Point. One nice thing is they have a salad bar

name: Hot Mess Ness
text: Been eating at this location for 4 years. Not much selection in this small town. In the beginning the food was great! Service was awesome! Throughout the years it‚Äôs gone downhill! Anywhere from getting your food and it‚Äôs not even what u ‚Ä¶More

name: Killol Butala
text: Good service. Convenient place on route to Mexico.

name: Matthew Kowalski
text: Everyone seems to complain that the pizza from here gives them the runs. I have had no such issue. Staff has always been friendly every time I've gone in. My order has always been correct and fresh, ready to go

name: V Reyes
text: Great face to face customer service, not so much over the phone. The place is pretty old but they keep it very clean. A must stop if you are heading down to rocky point. They do have pizza and salad buffet from 11 30 am to 2 pm( i think, not sure at what time it ends.)

name: Kathy Williams
text: Very good. Nice staff, fresh, hot food!

name: Judy Brent
text: We left without eating. We ordered a large Pepperoni pizza, original crust. When our order was brought out it was a cheese pizza. Brought this to our servers attention and he whisked it away. In less than 5 minutes he returned that pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave Bianes
text: Not a perfect experience but not as bad some of the reviews make it out to be. They seem to be trying to get it right. A person that seemed to be the manager came by our table and seem to be genuinely interested in our opinion of the meal. ‚Ä¶More

name: Christie Smith
text: Usually give 5 stars but soup was cold when deliver to my table pizza and wings was definitely a five star for everyone.Server very pleasant and accommodating to everyone's request. A satisfactory time for the whole family.

name: raymundo villarreal
text: Being that it is a nationwide pizza restaurant, the food tastes great. The buffet is the best you can get during lunch hours here in Ajo...

name: Grant Zelych
text: Service was pleasant but the pizza was over cooked and way too salty. The restaurant was dark and very noisy with cooking and ventilation noise. Not recommended!

name: FYCL
text: This place has been here for years and whoever the new owner is should really put in more effort to offer better service. Horrible service a bunch of confused kids working

name: Hector G
text: Good service very comfortable to chill and eat nothing like in the city.

name: Tom Redman
text: Pizza was very good but there was odd smell when you walk in and was worse near the counter/kitchen area. You have next to no choices of where to eat in this town so I would likely go again, as I saw the pizza was very good.

name: Lilian ayala
text: Went to the buffet and the food was tasty and fresh. I love Pizza Hut and will always continue going here for sure.

name: Marie Price
text: Great pizza and the waitress was wonderful.  Gigi made us feel like her only customer and thanked us for coming in and hoped to see us again.

name: bill hadley
text: New review for a new crew. Great pizza, a lot of new faces who seem to care about customers. Friendly, warm atmosphere, and have stopped having to check orders for accuracy.

name: Connie Rogers
text: Got a stuffed crust cheese pizza to go!! Always heat it on grill with olive oil at home to finish it! Yummy!

name: jeff coates
text: For Ajo, AZ great location & wait staff. A little dirty but like others I have been too.

name: Jesse Vooz
text: I've had some bad service before but this was the worst ever. Tomatoes in the salad bar were rotten and they were out of most pizzas. You are better off taking your chances with the corn dogs at the circle K.

name: ROBIN CARLSBAD
text: We love Pizza Hut, we go there often. Love the lunch buffet.

name: Alec Zuber
text: I guess the buffet closes at 1pm everyday. Staff was pretty short with us. We decided to leave. Maybe it was a bad day?

name: Matt Sheard
text: Staff was helpful and accommodated our group on the way down to Rocky Point

name: Rebecca Caskey
text: They charged me twice and the second  charge was way more than the original amount. Service wasn't good, we got drinks and then ignored until I paid. Lunch buffet  was the only thing that was ok. Sucks cuz family comes 2-3 times a year after trips to rocky point.

name: Angela Garcia
text: Best pizza ever!

name: Delma Garcia
text: Nice and cool at Pizza Hut. Great üçï !

name: H. Childs
text: Good dining experience. Always go to this location with a hangover though. Otherwise it'd be a 5 star, and "Great dining experience". But the hangover would be my fault, not Pizza Hut. So.... Yeah great and 5.

name: Georgia Cranney
text: A personal pan pizza was almost burnt around the edges. But customer service is improving.

name: carlos rojo
text: Really nice people on pizza taste Gray nice place

name: HickiwanNytOwl
text: Long wait but good pizza

name: TO Wildcat
text: I don't go to Ajo very often but I have noticed that the Pizza Hut in Ajo does make a very good pizza I would say better than most Pizza Huts around.  I'm not sure what their secret is but the pizza is good and fresh. On my recent visit the staff was very friendly.  Keep up the good work Ajo Pizza Hut.

name: Laura Campa
text: Always so good....

name: Andrew Navik
text: Quick service, delicious food. Can't ask for more when dropping in for lunch! Great way to take a break from a road trip.

name: Mitchee Brown
text: Good service food not bad.

name: David Martinez
text: Good costumer service, great server, restrooms need to be cleaner for been to small

name: Terry Ballard
text: TERRIBLE veggie pizza.  Menu shows "Veggie Lover's Delight"...on the 16" medium pizza, there MIGHT have been one mushroom, and about 3 strands of bell peppers.  All for $17 !!

name: Brekke Olsen
text: Amazing pizza amazing pasta amazing salad amazing over all amazing

name: Scott Williams
text: Apparently customer service is nonexistent in Ajo at the Pizza Hut. Not sure if they feel that customer service is unnecessary since they are the only place open in town past 4:00 PM. Refills, who needs refills? Apparently there is a one drink limit. Never saw our waiter after we got our meal.

name: Jonathan Allred
text: The people here were super helpful. And the food was way better than I remember it.

name: Betty DeMers
text: Despite confusion (on my part) when ordering, delicious pizza made quickly and to go! Certainly an excellent go-to when you're too tired to cook and want someone else to make dinner!

name: Joseph Herrera
text: Awesome.... good prices, great team of workers and friendly manager and the place is so clean and the restrooms are super clean and really the astmophere is something you don't expect to see in this small town....it stands out alot.....it ‚Ä¶More

name: Randall Williams
text: Great pizza with very friendly staff that are ready to help. It is the only fast food joint in town that I am aware of.

name: Taylor Smith
text: Very great service! Food is delicious and traditional and everyone is very friendly.

name: Cyndi Sandovsl
text: Waitress very pleasant. Checking on me seeing g if I needed anything.

name: Vannesa Benavides
text: Always a great experience. Awesome food.

name: Liz Kesterson
text:
What kind of Pizza Restaurant runs out of pepperoni?
Well, there was a misunderstanding between server and supervisor. There was pepperoni but it was being conserved due to low stock. My favorite pizza is ‚Ä¶More

text: Meat lovers pizza was the best. Good service too.

name: Cindy Carlsson
text: Good pizza and friendly service, but they were out of Everything (obviously nothing is actually made on site or from scratch) when we visited.

name: Tyler Johnson
text: The pizza is good for the price

name: Mark Vargas
text: Good attention to there customers

name: Nat
text: Their food is fresh and they never messed up my orders. The staff is friendly as well.

name: Stella Martinez
text: It's ok employees are dumb. Didn't know almost everyday is bring your child to work. Almost every time my order is messed up.

name: Scott Ruckh
text: Meh.  Service not great. Food not so good.  There is a reason why this place it rated lowest on trip advisor.

name: MARK CARLSBAD
text: Love the all you can eat salad bar! The hours for it could be a little longer; maybe from 11 to 1pm or 11:30 to 1:30 instead of 11:30 to 1, just a little suggestion from two of your fans!

name: Brandon Squire
text: Better fast food pizzas.

name: Michael Lyles
text: No line to wait in. Salad bar wasn't stocked or clean. Only choice of sodas was Dt Pepsi or Mt Dew... Seriously!

name: Tony Brown
text: Service is ok, you might get the pizza you ordered.

name: Ronald Miller
text: Well, its just about the only restaurant in Ajo.  Pizza is okay but they don't honor a lot of the "deals" and service is pretty hit or miss.  Your better off just getting it carryout.

name: Diane Lind
text: Pizza was good I only had hand tossed Pizza no pan but it was still good

name: Michael Seeley
text: Good food when you get the right order

text: I ordered a 12 Hot wings and they gave me 16 hot wings and they charged me for the 16 hot wings and the sprite and Pepsi tasted weird
